caption: Adam Coscia presented VisPile at the 2025 Georgia Tech Career, Research, and Innovation Development Conference. He won a travel award! Feb 2025.
Arpit Narechania passed his PhD defense of dissertation. Congratulations, Dr. Narechania! Dec 2024.
Adam Coscia was selected as one of eight finalists for the GVU and IPaT Foley Scholar Award for 2024 in the PhD category. Nov 2024.

Arpit Narechania was named as one of the Graduate Teaching Fellows for 2023-24 and received the national CIRTL associate and Tech to Teaching certificates by CIRTL and CTL! Congratulations, Arpit! Jun 2023.
Our lab at ACM CHI 2023 in Hamburg, Germany! Arpit Narechania presented DataPilot and Grace Guo presented CausalVis. Apr 2023.
Members of GT VIS having fun conversations over lunch at the Collective Food Hall in the CODA building. Feb 2023.
Arpit Narechania presented Exploropleth and Adam Coscia presented KnowledgeVIS at the 2023 Georgia Tech Career, Research, and Innovation Development Conference. They won travel awards! Feb 2023.
Members of GT VIS watching a close match of the 2022 FIFA World Cup! Nov 2022.
Hanging out with alumni, friends, and family of GT VIS for our annual VISGiving celebration! Nov 2022.
Our lab at IEEE VIS 2022! Arpit Narechania presented NL4DV. Oct 2022.
Grace Guo and Adam Coscia presenting their on-going research at a meeting of the NSF AI Institute for Adult Learning and Online Education (AI-ALOE). Aug 2022.
